BIO

My journey for web development began late in the year of 2018 in pursuit of a long and rewarding career in something i am passionate about. While my journey has nearly just started i have a few technologies stated about i have worked with.I attend to start Lambda Coding School in July of 2019 to further extend my knowledge and land a career in the technology field.
